tool.name: BlastN TSV to gapped GFF3
tool.description: converts tabular blast results to a JBrowse-compatible file

param.label: Gap Size
param.help: Maximum gap in blast alignment, before a new match_part is generated
param.name: min_gap

tool.help:
**What it does**
Convert BLASTn TSV results into GFF3 format.
This tool assumes BLASTn input and is therefore NOT suitable for BLASTp data.
